FrameStatistics module

class FrameStatistics.FrameStatistics(ip_add: str, port: int = 0, title: str = '')[source]

Bases: object

This class is responsible for collecting and presenting statistics about the frames sent and received.

get_ip_add() → str[source]

Get the IP address of the device.

Returns:

The IP address of the device.

get_port() → int[source]

Get the port number of the device.

Returns:

The port number of the device.

allow_stats(option: bool) → None[source]

Enable or disable statistics collection.

Parameters:

option – True to enable, False to disable.

update_send(frame: Frame = None, name: str = None)[source]

Update the statistics for sent frames.

Parameters:

  • frame – The sent frame.

  • name – The name of the frame.

update_recv(frame: Frame = None, name: str = None)[source]

Update the statistics for received frames.

Parameters:

  • frame – The received frame.

  • name – The name of the frame.

reset_statistics()[source]

Reset all statistics to their initial values.

create_rule(name: str, value: int = 0)[source]

Create a new rule for the statistics.

Parameters:

  • name – The name of the rule.

  • value – The initial value of the rule.
